cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Veterans’ Affairs on May 4, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 2419, Affordable Housing for Homeless Veterans Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 61 (Thursday, April 8, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MANN:
H.R. 2419.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 3 of section 8 of article 1 of the Constitution.
[Page H1721]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported by the Yeas and Nays: 22 - 6.

title: Affordable Housing for Homeless Veterans Act of 2021
